summary_text: Overall ROAS is 5.83. ROAS has fluctuated significantly, with a recent decline, possibly indicating creative fatigue. The top creatives show high ROAS, while the worst creatives perform poorly, suggesting a need for creative refreshment. Some creatives show signs of fatigue, such as declining CTR and ROAS despite a large number of impressions.

insights.title: Decline in ROAS
insights.description: The ROAS has dropped in the recent days, indicating a potential issue with ad performance. This may be due to a variety of factors, including increased competition, changes in the target audience, or ad fatigue.

insights.title: Creative Fatigue Detected
insights.description: Several creatives show signs of fatigue, indicated by declining CTR and ROAS despite high impression counts. Refreshing or replacing these creatives could improve performance.

creative_issues.creative: Breathable bamboo that moves with you — limited offer on men briefs.
Breathable bamboo that moves with you — limited offer on men briefs.

insights.title: Creative Performance Disparity
insights.description: There's a large performance gap between the best and worst performing creatives. Focus on scaling the strategies used in top creatives and replacing or significantly modifying the low-performing ones.

creative_issues.creative: Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our women bras.
Breathable modal that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.
